subject: Quality issue - P2 Black missing springs
description_text:
Hi Ariel,

I have a quality complaint from a customer saying his P2 Black was shipped without the springs circled below:

[cid:image001.png@01DC02CE.56772680]

I will send one package I have here from the pedal I have in the showroom, but I need you to replace it for me.

I wait for your confirmation.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:image002.jpg@01DC02CE.56772680]
USA: +1 949 508 0061
http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>
